description: Amazon has kicked off its Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 in India. The annual sale started on May 1 at noon for all users after providing 12-hour early access for Prime customers. The sale is live on the e-commerce platform with up to 45 percent off on laptops. If you are looking for a premium laptop, the ongoing sale has listed laptops from brands like Lenovo, Asus, HP and more at reduced prices.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Premium Laptops

description: Honor 400 Pro is expected to hit the shelves soon as a successor to last year's Honor 300 Pro. Ahead of any official announcement, the latest smartphone has surfaced on the Geekbench benchmarking site. The Honor 400 Pro is shown to run on an octa-core Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. The listing suggests model number DNP-NX9 and the Android 15 operating system on the handset.
title: Honor 400 Pro Arrives on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 12GB of RAM

description: Microsoft is raising prices on its Xbox games, consoles and accessories amid broader uncertainty about the trade war.  Controller and headset prices are also increasing. supported. Microsoft’s gaming strategy revolves around building up its Game Pass subscription service, offered across its consoles, PC and smart TV platforms
title: Microsoft Raises Xbox and Game Prices, Citing Rising Costs

description: US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers in Oakland, California, on Thursday ruled that Elon Musk can pursue fraud claims in the complaint he filed against OpenAI last year. She also declined to dismiss an unjust enrichment claim against OpenAI and Microsoft Corp., a major investor in the startup.
title: OpenAI Can’t Dodge Elon Musk’s Fraud Claims in Restructuring Suit

description: Oppo Reno 14 series launch has been officially teased by the company in China. However, the exact launch date of the handsets has not yet been revealed. The lineup will likely include a base and a Pro variant. The design and expected key features of the purported smartphones have surfaced online previously. The vanilla version has now appeared on a popular benchmarking website.
title: Oppo Reno 14 With MediaTek Dimensity 8400 SoC Seen on Geekbench Ahead of Debut

description: Spotify claims to have submitted an app update to Apple with an external link to buy subscriptions. Both Spotify and Apple have been engaged in a longstanding and contentious rivalry, centered around the Cupertino, California-based company's App Store policies and their impact on the streaming company's business operations.
title: Spotify Submits App Update to Apple with External Link for Purchases in US

description: NISAR, the joint NASA-ISRO satellite mission, is set to launch in June 2025 after resolving technical issues. It will monitor Earth's surface with advanced radar imaging. The NASA-ISRO Synthetic Aperture Radar (NISAR) mission is finally nearing liftoff after overcoming delays caused by overheating concerns in its 12-meter radar antenna. Now scheduled to launch in June 2025, the Earth observation satellite will use cutting-edge dual-band radar to track minute changes in the planet’s landforms, ice sheets, and ecosystems every 12 days. A major milestone in Indo-US space cooperation, NISAR will deliver critical data to support climate research, disaster management, and infrastructure planning worldwide.
title: ISRO Sets June 2025 Launch for Joint NASA-ISRO NISAR Satellite After Delays

description: NASA’s Juno probe has uncovered colliding cyclones circling Jupiter’s north pole and flowing magma beneath the crust of its volcanic moon Io. Using thermal and microwave instruments, scientists have tracked atmospheric chaos and subsurface lava flows, offering new insights into the Jovian system’s extreme weather and volcanic activity. These discoveries reshape the understanding of planetary heat and atmospheric dynamics.
title: Juno Mission Sheds Light on Jupiter’s Storms and Volcanic Activity on Io

description: NASA’s Psyche spacecraft, en route to a metal-rich asteroid, paused its thrusters after detecting a drop in xenon gas pressure. Engineers are investigating the issue while keeping the mission on track. Psyche will fly by Mars in 2026 before entering asteroid orbit in 2029.
title: NASA’s Psyche Mission Encounters Pressure Drop, Backup Systems on Standby

description: NASA’s Fermi Gamma-ray Space Telescope has revealed that some of the universe’s brightest light sources originate near supermassive black holes in galaxy centres. These active galactic nuclei emit intense radiation, including gamma rays and X-rays, despite black holes themselves being invisible. Their powerful jets and high-energy emissions challenge current understandings of cosmic dynamics and galaxy evolution.
title: New Study Uncovers Shadowy Origins of Universe’s Most Luminous Phenomena

description: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G is now available in a new finish in India. The handset was launched in April in the country alongside Realme Narzo 80x 5G with two colour options — Racing Green and Speed Silver. The new colour variant was introduced as part of Realme's seventh anniversary celebrations. The Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G runs on MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC and features a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G Nitro Orange Colour Variant Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Skywatchers can catch a fleeting celestial display as a wafer-thin crescent moon appears near Jupiter in the western sky on April 29 and 30. The moon will leap to Jupiter’s upper right by April 30 evening, with just over five degrees separating the two. Earthshine and nearby stars add to this picturesque twilight event visible shortly after sunset.
title: See a Wafer-Thin Crescent Moon Leapfrog Jupiter in the Post-Sunset Sky This Week

description: Amazon has kicked off its Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 in India. The annual sale started on May 1 at noon for all users after providing 12-hour early access for Prime customers. The sale is live on the e-commerce platform with up to 45 percent off on laptops. If you are looking for a premium laptop, the ongoing sale has listed laptops from brands like Lenovo, Asus, HP and more at reduced prices.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Premium Laptops

description: The Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is a great time to purchase headphones at a highly discounted price. Buyers can find options from major brands such as Blaupunkt, JBL, Sony, Sennheiser, and more, at considerably lower prices than their list prices. So, if you’ve been scouring the market for a good pair of headphones, then we’ve compiled a list of the best deals on headphones available during the Amazon sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Top Deals on Headphones

description: Apple's much-awaited quarterly earnings report failed to soothe investor concerns.  The iPhone maker warned in the Thursday statement that tariffs will increase costs this quarter, a sign that geopolitical tensions are taking a growing toll on the world’s most valuable business.
title: Apple Renews Fears About Tariffs, China With Wobbly Report

description: Apple to source more than 19 billion chips from the US this year. Company CEO Tim Cook  affirmed expectations that Apple will in future make the vast majority of its US-bound iPhones in India — reducing output from China as the Donald Trump administration threatens to slap punitive tariffs on its Asian rival.
title: Apple to Source Billions of US-Made Chips in Supply Chain Shift

description: Asus has launched the 2025 ROG laptop lineup in India. The new range of gaming-focused PCs, which were announced during the Consumer Electronics Show (CES 2025) in January, include six models — Asus ROG Strix Scar 16, ROG Strix Scar 18, ROG Strix G16, ROG Zephyrus G16, ROG Zephyrus G14, and the ROG Flow Z13. The new ROG laptops are powered by Intel Core Ultra 9 and AMD Ryzen AI Max processors.
title: Asus Updates ROG Strix Scar, Strix, Zephyrus and Flow Gaming Laptop Lineups With Intel and AMD CPUs

description: The Bharat Web3 Association has announced a cybersecurity workshop to be hosted in Bengaluru on May 8. Sridhar Govardhan, the chief information security officer (CISO) of CoinDCX has been invited to discuss the lessons that can be taken from recent breaches that dented the Web3 space. Other senior members from companies like CoinSwitch and Mudrex are also listed to speak at the workshop, Chenoy told Gadgets 360.
title: Bharat Web3 Association to Host Web3 Cybersecurity Workshop in Bengaluru on May 8

description: Grand Theft Auto 6 has been delayed and will now launch on May 26, 2026, Rockstar Games announced Friday. The long-awaited title, which was announced in December 2023, was set for release in Fall 2025, a window confirmed several times by Rockstar parent Take-Two Interactive.
title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Delayed to Next Year, Will Launch on May 26, 2026

description: OnePlus Nord CE 5 has been doing the rounds of the rumour mill over the past few weeks. The handset has appeared on an Indian certification site, suggesting an imminent India launch. Previous leaks and reports have suggested the expected design and key features of the phone. The purported smartphone may sport a refreshed design over its preceding model.
title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Spotted on BIS Website, Could Launch in India Soon: Report

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 started in India on May 1 for all users in the country. During the ongoing sale, shoppers can enjoy lucrative discounts on a wide range of essential items like fashion items, stationery, furniture, large appliances and personal gadgets.  Here we have put together some of the best deals you can avail of on smart televisions priced under Rs. 50,000.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart TVs Under Rs 50,000

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is currently live for all users in India. It offers a wide range of products, including consumer electronics, at a discounted rate. Thus, customers who wish to upgrade their existing gadgets can take advantage of discounts of up to 80 percent and other offers to get their hands on their desired smartwatches. Here, we have compiled a list of some of the best deals on smartwatches that you can grab before the sale ends.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smartwatches

description: Gemini app will get new personalisation features to make users’ experience more immersive. A Google executive revealed that the company is working to upgrade the chatbot app with enhanced memory and the ability to draw upon information from users’ Google accounts. The AI app might also get new agentic capabilities similar to the Deep Research tool. These features will be unveiled at Google I/O 2025, the executive added.
title: Gemini App to Get Improved Personalisation Features; Gemini Ultra Plan Said to Be in the Works

description: Google announced an expansion of its AI Mode feature in Search, alongside new features, on Thursday. The Mountain View-based tech giant first released this artificial intelligence (AI) search mode in March, making it available to the Google One AI Premium subscribers in the US on an invitational basis.
title: Google Search’s AI Mode Rolls Out to More Users With New Features

description: Google is strealining the setup process for Google TVs, making it faster and easier for users to ready up their devices and start watching. The company announced new features that speed up Google TV setup, including adding a new way to quickly set up the device through Android and iOS smartphones.
title: Google Makes Setting Up a New Google TV Easier with Faster Onboarding, More Features

description: Google is adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature in Google Drive that will allow users to converse with Gemini about their files. The Mountain View-based tech giant began rolling out the feature to eligible account holders on Thursday. The new feature is similar to NotebookLM, where users can add a source and then chat with the AI about its content.
title: Google Drive Gets Gemini AI-Powered Conversation Feature for Uploaded Files

description: Poco F7 has appeared on a certification site, suggesting an imminent launch. Previously, the handset was reportedly listed on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, which hints at a probable India launch of the phone. It will likely come as a rebranded version of the Redmi Turbo 4 Pro phone, which was unveiled in China in April.
title: Poco F7 Reportedly Listed on IMDA Certification Website Ahead of Anticipated Launch

description: Google appears to be preparing a more extensive redesign for Android 16, and a recent leak highlights some of the new enhancements set to arrive with the update. Google is reportedly adding a major overhaul of the notifications and Quick Settings area in the next update. The new version is likely to apply background blur to Quick Settings and other areas.
title: Android 16 to Arrive With Redesigned Quick Settings, Visual Enhancements and New Animations: Report

description: Google listed the Android and iOS apps of NotebookLM on Thursday. These apps are currently not available for download, but those interested can pre-register, and the app will be automatically installed once it is launched. On the App Store, the app page says that it will go live on May 20, which is also the first day of Google I/O 2025.
title: Google's NotebookLM Android, iOS Apps Listed on App Stores Ahead of Launch at Google I/O 2025

description: iQOO recently launched its Neo 10R smartphone in India with a mid-range price tag. Given the ‘R’ branding, it is the slightly watered-down model of the iQOO 10 or 10 Pro which was announced in China last year. The Neo 10R was launched all by itself with no sign of a standard or more powerful Neo 10 or Neo 10 Pro model. Turns out, there’s a slightly modified Neo 10 on the way and it’s expected to launch sooner than later.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Visits Geekbench With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Processor, 12GB of RAM

description: A new geological study reveals that Yellowstone National Park may harbor a valuable source of carbon-free helium, a gas crucial for medical devices, space missions, and quantum technologies. Traditionally extracted alongside fossil fuels, helium is in global shortage and poses environmental concerns when sourced conventionally. Scientists have identified geothermal conditions and ancient uranium-rich rocks in Yellowstone that could offer a cleaner helium alternative. These findings may point the way toward a more sustainable future for high-tech industries increasingly reliant on this non-renewable resource.
title: New Study Suggests Yellowstone May Help Solve the World’s Helium Crisis

description: Samsung’s latest Galaxy S25 series is said to be in high demand among consumers with the Galaxy S25 Ultra seeing the highest sales numbers. As per a financial services firm, the top-of-the-line handset outperformed both of its siblings, the Galaxy S25 and the Galaxy S25+, in terms of sales combined, despite commanding a considerably higher price tag. Samsung is reported to have sold 9.16 million units across all three models which amounts to nearly half of its total smartphone sales.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Reportedly Outsold Galaxy S25 and S25+ Combined in Global Markets

description: The hit Telugu series 3 Roses returns with Season 2, featuring Eesha Rebba and Harsha Chemudu. Directed by K. Kiran Kumar and produced by SKN, the show brings fresh characters and girl-centric narratives. Streaming soon on Aha Video, the teaser hints at new adventures and bold friendship tales.
title: 3 Roses Season 2 OTT Release: Where to Watch Girl-Centric Telugu Drama Series Online?

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by nearly two percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether joined the rally on Friday. Cardano, Avalanche, and Chainlink also registered profits. Meanwhile, Tether and Monero recorded losses.
title: Bitcoin Price Crosses $96,000 for the First Time Since March, Ongoing Rally Boosts Altcoin Prices

description: Heartbeat Season 2 is set to stream mid-2025 on JioHotstar. The medical drama delves deeper into the lives of surgical interns and their mentors at RK Multispeciality Hospital, exploring new personal and professional challenges. With returning cast and fresh faces, the series promises more gripping narratives.
title: HeartBeat Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Honor Watch 5 Ultra was initially unveiled at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 in March this year. It supports electrocardiogram (ECG) reading and is said to offer up to 15 days of battery life. It may finally be available for purchase in China. The company has teased the launch of new smartwatches in the country. A design seen in a promotional image suggests one of the new variants could be the Watch 5 Ultra.
title: Honor Teases Launch of New Smartwatches; Honor Watch 5 Ultra Could Debut Soon

description: Directed by J. Sabarish, Paraman is a Tamil family drama that revolves around a farmer named Paraman whose land has been seized by the government as a result of a conspiracy. To win the case, his entire life is at stake. Will he win the case? Or will he lose everything? To know more, watch this excellent movie streaming currently on Sun NXT. Available in Tamil Language only.
title: Paraman Now Streaming On Sun NXT: What You Need to Know

description: Based on the novel by Alafair Burke, The Better Sister is an American Thriller that revolves around a brutal murder and how two sisters reunite to solve this mystery. The sequences and revelations of the secrets are horrific. The starcast has delivered outstanding performances. Each twist and turn will keep the viewers hooked to their seats.
title: The Better Sister OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Wednesday Season 2 is set to stream in two parts on Netflix starting August 6, 2025. The new season will follow Wednesday Addams through darker storylines, with Jenna Ortega returning in the lead role. Directed by Tim Burton, the season adds new characters and deepens the Addams Family lore.
title: Wednesday Season 2 Will Unveil in Two Parts on Netflix — Get Ready for a Darker Turn

description: OnePlus Nord 5 is tipped to launch in India soon. A tipster has suggested the expected launch timeline, price and key features of the purported handset. It is expected to be powered by a binned version of the MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset. The phone could be a modified version of the OnePlus Ace 5V, which is expected to be unveiled in China later this month.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 Price in India, Launch Timeline, Key Features Surface Online

description: Realme C75 5G could launch soon as a new entrant in the company's C series. While details about its launch date remain a mystery, the handset has been spotted on multiple certification platforms, including the Google Play supported devices list and Google Play Console website. The alleged Google Play Console listing reveals the design and specifications of the Realme C75 5G.
title: Realme C75 5G Spotted on Google Play Console, Google Play Supported Devices List Hinting at Imminent Launch

description: Sony Xperia 1 VII is widely believed to be in development as the successor to the Xperia 1 VI. The phone has surfaced on a benchmarking website which not only hints towards its imminent debut, but also details several of its specifications. It is said to be powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with 12GB of RAM. It may ship with Android 15.
title: Sony Xperia 1 VII with Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and 12GB of RAM Surfaces on Geekbench Ahead of Launch

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is rumoured to be in development as the fourth addition to the Galaxy S25 lineup. Ahead of its anticipated debut which is said to take place this month, a major leak has surfaced which provides details about the phone’s specifications as well as its price. The phone could be powered by the same Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip as other S25 models and may become the only model in the lineup to debut with two cameras instead of three.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Specifications and Price Leak Ahead of Launch This Month
